title: Title
text:
Introduction

What is the topic of this guide, and why is it important?
What problem does this concept or paper aim to solve?
What are the main contributions or breakthroughs introduced?
How does this fit into the broader context of the field?
Who would benefit from understanding this guide, and what will they learn?

title: Title
text:
Background and Motivation

What challenges or problems existed before this work?
What inspired this idea, concept, or solution?
How does this approach differ from previous methods?
What are the key assumptions or principles that underpin this work?
Why was solving this problem important or necessary?

title: Title
text:
Core
General Questions: * What are the foundational ideas or building blocks? * How does this concept or mechanism work step-by-step? * What are the inputs, processes, and outputs involved? * What are the strengths and limitations of this approach? * What are the key equations, algorithms, or methods associated with it?
Visualization Questions: * Can this idea or process be visualized? If so, how? * What diagrams or graphs can help illustrate the key points? * How can we interpret the behavior or results visually?
Code Questions: * How can this concept be implemented in code? * What are the key components or parameters of the implementation? * What are some practical examples or demonstrations of this idea? * How does the code reflect the theory or process behind the concept?

title: Title
text:
Application and Insights

Where and how is this concept applied in the real world?
What problems does it solve, and what value does it provide?
What are some examples or use cases where this has been impactful?
What are the broader implications or insights gained from this work?
How does this contribute to advancements in the field or industry?

title: Title
text:
Conclusion

What are the key takeaways or lessons from this guide?
Why is this concept significant in the broader context of the field?
What questions remain unanswered or open for further exploration?
What resources or next steps can help deepen understanding?
How can this knowledge be applied or expanded upon in practice?
